full_summary:
Tender Announcement for Power Supply System Upgrade
============================================================

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS3644010057-Doc3647970994

**Amendment Number**
-------------------

5

**Solicitation Number**
----------------------

WS3644010057

**Publication Date**
-------------------

January 10, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time**
---------------------------------

February 23, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST

**Contract Details**
---------------------

*   **UNSPSC Code**: 72151502 (Electric power system construction service)
*   **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction and Maintenance Services)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFC)

**Tender Description**
-------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the power supply system upgrade project. The project aims to modernize the existing power supply system.

**Important Dates and Times**
---------------------------

*   **Optional Site Visit**: January 18, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. at 98 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario
*   **Mandatory Viewing of Bid Documents**: Bidders must have a Designated Organization Screening (DOS) with approved Document Safeguarding Capability at the level of PROTECTED B, issued by the PWGSC Contract Security Program (CSP)

**How to Get the Bid Documents**
---------------------------------

To obtain the bid documents, bidders must log in to Ariba Discovery (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15091326) and submit a request for the documents.

**Eligibility Criteria**
-----------------------

*   Bidders must meet the specified requirements and qualifications
*   Bidders must be registered with the Ariba Discovery platform

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

*   The selection will be based on the highest combined rating for technical merit and price

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

For any queries or concerns, please contact Cody Larocque, PSPC/SPAC, at cody.larocque@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

The Tender Closing Date and Time is February 23, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EST. Failure to meet this deadline will result in non-compliance. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to cancel or modify the tender at any stage.
